data.message:
Maybe I'm the only one having issues, but my app keeps forcing closed. No new updates pending to be installed. Is there an update or bug fix coming to correct this issue?

Oh, and thanks for being awesome. :)

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Crystal. In order to better track the issue, can you please report the problem in the app? To do so, click the blue arrow in the top-right corner of a Facebook page, select "Report a Problem" and follow the on-screen instructions. If you are unable to report the problem within the app, can you please report your crash or force close issue through the Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1pdq7jS -Sarah
Hi, Facebook@ I sent all the documents for my Paige Paige for Vryfay but do not know please help https://www.facebook.com/chef.hamidebrahimi?ref=br_rs
I actually had reported it but after about two weeks the issue has been corrected. Thanks.
